name: Felino Malbec
serverNotes:

name: Stags' Leap Merlot
serverNotes:
üìñ ABOUT: (stagsleap.com) Full-bodied Napa Merlot from legendary Stags' Leap Winery. Highly rated 95 pts by James Suckling! From famous Stags Leap District.

üç∑ STYLE: Full-bodied Napa Merlot | Plush black cherry, chocolate & subtle oak | Elegant smooth tannins | Long finish | Premium California elegance.
